alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Back (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 11 at 3:39AM MST until December 13 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches, locally up to 16 inches in the Ogden Valley. * WHERE...Wasatch Back. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 5 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest period of snow is expected between 5 PM this evening and 8 AM Monday morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
